constructor-arg.value: select id, username, companyid from auth_user_profile, auth_users, prof_company_user where auth_users.userid = auth_user_profile.id and auth_users.userid = prof_company_user.userid and attrname = 'fffcCustomerId' and attrvalue = :customerId
select distinct tm_account.account_number_display, '1FFC-ea0f1923-255f-4f12-a603-16a1ed4f950c' "bill_group" from tm_account where org_id = :customerId and account_number = :accountId

select bill.invoice_number, bill_summary.due_date from prof_company_user, prof_company_account, tm_account, bill_file_meta_data, bill, bill_summary where prof_company_user.userid = :userId and prof_company_account.company_id = prof_company_user.companyid and tm_account.id = prof_company_account.account_id and tm_account.account_number = :accountId and bill_file_meta_data.payment_group = tm_account.bill_group and bill_file_meta_data.bill_file_id = bill.bill_file_id and bill.account = tm_account.account_number and bill_summary.bill_id = bill.bill_id and bill_summary.due_date is not null order by bill_date desc limit 1

select count(*), sum(pay_amt), max(pay_date) from pmt_schedule, pmt_grouping where pmt_schedule.online_trans_id = pmt_grouping.online_trans_id and user_id = :userId and internal_account_number = :accountId and pay_date <= :date

select count(*), sum(pay_amt), max(pay_date) from pmt_schedule, pmt_grouping where pmt_schedule.online_trans_id = pmt_grouping.online_trans_id and user_id = :userId and internal_account_number = :accountId

select pay_date, pay_prior_days, expiry_cancel, expiry_date, pay_count, pay_amt_rule, pay_upto, pmt_automatic.automatic_id, source_id from pmt_automatic, pmt_automatic_grouping where pmt_automatic.automatic_id = pmt_automatic_grouping.automatic_id and pmt_automatic.user_id = :userId and pmt_automatic_grouping.internal_account_number = :accountId

select ps.online_trans_id as paymentId, ps.source_details as paymentSourceNames, ps.pay_type as paymentCategory, ps.pay_amt as paymentAmount, ps.pay_surcharge as paymentSurcharge, ps.pay_total_amt as paymentTotalAmount, ps.pay_date as paymentDate, ps.pay_status as paymentStatus from pmt_schedule ps, pmt_grouping pg where ps.online_trans_id = pg.online_trans_id AND ps.user_id = :userId AND pg.internal_account_number = :accountId
select id, account_number, bill_group from tm_account where org_id = :org_id and end_date is null
